title: Variant
description: A purchasable variant of a product with specific option values.

id.description: Global ID (GID) uniquely identifying this variant. Used as item.id in checkout.

sku.description: Business-assigned identifier for inventory and fulfillment.

barcode.description: Industry-standard identifier (UPC, EAN, ISBN) for the variant.

description.description: Variant description in one or more formats.

category.description: Variant categories with optional taxonomy identifiers.

list_price.description: List price before discounts (for strikethrough display).

available.description: Whether this variant can be purchased.

options.description: Option values that define this variant (e.g., Color: Blue, Size: Large).

media.description: Variant media (images, videos, 3D models). First item is the featured media for listings.

tags.description: Variant tags for categorization and search.

metadata.description: Business-defined custom data extending the standard variant model.

seller.description: Optional seller context for this variant.
